title: Aubrey Plaza
description:
Actress, comedian, and producer Aubrey Plaza feels totally fine about being Conan O’Brien’s friend.


 

Aubrey sits down with Conan to discuss playing basketball in disguise, getting cast in her breakout role as April Ludgate on Parks and Recreation, and her new movie Emily the Criminal. Later, Sona’s assistant David Hopping tells the tale of how he came to work under Conan.


 

Got a question for Conan? Call our voicemail: (323) 451-2821.


 

For Conan videos, tour dates and more visit TeamCoco.com.
author: conaf@teamcoco.com (Team Coco & Earwolf)
